text:
GoodRx | Sr. Software Engineer (Python) LA / SF/ Remote | Fulltime

GoodRx is looking for extremely smart and capable Senior Software Engineers, who are deft at working with a wide variety of technologies such as Python, Pyramid, MySQL, PostgreSQL on AWS, in a fast-paced and friendly environment.

Apply: Jobs@goodrx.com or https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/goodrxcom/view/P_AAA...
